# calcite-shell-center-row

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                          | Type                | Default |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------- | ------- |
| `detached`    | `detached`     | This property makes the content area appear like a "floating" panel. | `boolean`           | `false` |
| `heightScale` | `height-scale` | Specifies the maxiumum height of the row.                            | `"l" \| "m" \| "s"` | `"s"`   |
| `position`    | `position`     | Arranges the component depending on the elements 'dir' property.     | `"end" \| "start"`  | `"end"` |

## Slots

| Slot           | Description                                            |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
|                | A slot for adding content to the center row.          |
| `"action-bar"` | A slot for adding a `calcite-action-bar` to the center row. |
